name: TrivialFacts
0:
”Alexa open trivial facts and tell me a fact”
”give me some facts”
”tell me one trivial”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivial facts
des:
read some random and interesting facts:
1. tell me a (one) fact 
2. give me some trivials

the first utterance reads one fact while the second will ask if you want to hear more
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
